alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:29PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hazel Green, or 7 miles northwest of Meridianville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Harvest, New Market, Lincoln, Elkwood, Belleview and Toney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for north central Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
